Combat
Hit Points: 68 Armor Class: 22 (dexterity (1 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 20 (strength; trained)
Armor: Chain Mail Shield: Steel (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Bola (+12 1d6+3 B R20'; dexterity; expert); Light Mace (+12 1d4+3 B; strength; expert); Main-gauche (+12 1d4+3 P/S; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +10
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3

Strength Attack Adjustment: +3
Unconventional Weaponry (Spirit Thresher): Weapon Familiarity (Spirit Thresher)
Fighter Weapon Mastery: Critical hits with a master proficiency weapon inflict its critical specialization effect
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Save: Fortitude: +11 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +12 (dexterity; expert); Will: +10 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Bravery: Save Expert (Will)
Bravery: Successes on Will saves vs. fear are critical successes, and the initial severity of frightened conditions is reduced by 1
Magic
Spell Slots: O1: 2; O4: 2; O7: 1; OC1: 2 Focus Points: 1 Attack: Occult: +13 (charisma; master) Spell DC: Occult: 23 (charisma; master)
Spells:
Counter Performance (O1 Foc): (R) Allies in a 60' emanation can substitute a self Performance roll for a save vs. the triggering auditory or visual effect
Courageous Anthem (OC1 Foc): (1) 60' emanation gives allies +1 attack, damage, and saves vs. fear for 1 rd
Magic Notes:
Anthemic Performance: Knows the Courageous Anthem occult cantrip
Bard Dedication: Spell Trained (Occult)/Knows 2 occult cantrips
Basic Bard Spellcasting: Knows 1 1st-rank occult spell
Counter Perform: Knows the Counter Performance occult spell/Has a focus pool
Expert Bard Spellcasting: Spell Expert (Occult)/Knows 1 4th-rank occult spell
Master Bard Spellcasting: Spell Master (Occult)/Knows 1 7th-rank occult spell
Occult Breadth: Has additional archetype spell slots
Bard Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the occult tradition
Notes
Validation Errors:
Advanced Muse's Whispers Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 6 and basic muse's whispers feature (currently 1)
Anthemic Performance Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 8 and bard dedication feature (currently 1)
Class Feats Allocation: 5 available vs. 9 allocated
Counter Perform Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 6 and bard dedication feature (currently 1)
Expert Bard Spellcasting Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 12, basic bard spellcasting feature (currently 1) and occultism rank (currently 4) >= 3
Master Bard Spellcasting Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 18, expert bard spellcasting feature (currently 1) and occultism rank (currently 4) >= 4
Occult Breadth Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 8 and basic bard spellcasting feature (currently 1)
